hibernate-mapping.sql-query: insert into EO_WORK_CONTAINER (EOWC_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, PM_CODE, EOWC_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOWC_CONTAINER_TYPE_CODE, EOWC_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME, EOWC_QUANTITY, EOWC_REMARK) select SEQ_EO_WORK_CONTAINER.NEXTVAL, /*EOWC_ID*/ EOWO.CREATOR, /*CREATOR*/ SYSDATE, /*CREATE_TIME*/ EOWO.MODIFIER, /*MODIFIER*/ SYSDATE, /*MODIFY_TIME*/ 0, /*REC_VER*/ 0, /*REC_STATUS*/ EOOC.ORG_ID, /*ORG_ID*/ SYS_GUID(), /*PM_CODE*/ EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO, /*EOWC_WORK_ORDER_NO*/ EOOC.EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_CODE, EOOC.EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME, EOOC.EOOC_QUANTITY, EOOC.EOOC_REMARK from EO_ORDER_CONTAINER EOOC left join EO_WORK_ORDER EOWO on EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_NO = EOOC.EOOC_ORDER_NO and EOWO.ORG_ID = EOOC.ORG_ID where EOOC.EOOC_ORDER_NO = :eoorOrderNo and EOOC.ORG_ID = :orgId
